snippet.title: Half-Life 2: SURVIVOR: Japanese Arcade Version - Full Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Half-Life 2: Survivor is an arcade game based on HL2 released in Japan. Players control their movement using two joysticks (one for each hand) and floor pedals. It's...different. This was difficult to record with the controls etc 

★★★ Please SUBSCRIBE, LIKE and SHARE ★★★ Thanks :)

Join us on: 
Discord:► https://halflife.chat
Twitter:► http://twitter.com/Bolloxed_Potato

Half-Life 2: SURVIVOR MISSIONS ► https://youtu.be/zl9FdvfO7zw
Half-Life 2: G-String ►►► https://youtu.be/3KvNL7RYVaU


--------------------------------
